mapper.select: select user_code, user_name, user_acct, user_password, version from t_sys_user where user_code = #{userId} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user (user_code, user_acct, user_password, user_name, sex, phone, email, id_card, role, image_path, is_deleted, create_name, create_time, version ) values (#{userCode}, #{userAcct}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{idCard}, 2, #{imagePath}, #{isDeleted}, #{createName}, now(), 0 )
insert into t_customer (user_code, invite_code, is_deleted, create_name, create_time, version ) values (#{userCode}, #{inviteCode}, #{isDeleted}, #{createName}, now(), 0 )
mapper.update: update t_sys_user set user_password = #{userNewPassword}, update_time = now(), update_name = #{updateName}, version = version + 1 where user_code = #{userCode}
